entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -18.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -26.2°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:51 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:51 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:51 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
